languages.text: {n}Плечи мужчины чуть никнут.{/n} "Ну что ж делать... не мой сегодня день. Да и когда было иначе?"
{n}He slumps a little.{/n} "That's that, then... It's just not my day. When is it ever?"
languages.original_text: {n}Плечи мужчины чуть никнут.{/n} "Ну что ж делать... не мой сегодня день. Да и когда было иначе?"

traits.locale_text: {n}He slumps a little.{/n} "What can you do... it's not my day. And when was it any different?"
{n}He slumps a little.{/n} "What can you do... it's not my day. And when was it any different?"
{n}He slumps a little.{/n} "That's that, then... It's just not my day. When is it ever?"
{n}He slumps a little.{/n} "That's that, then... It's just not my day. When is it ever?"
{n}He slumps a little.{/n} "That's that, then... It's just not my day. When is it ever?"

languages.text: {n}他有点泄了气。{/n}“那就这样吧……看来今天不是我的幸运日。我到底什么时候才能走运呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}He slumps a little.{/n} "That's that, then... It's just not my day. When is it ever?"

traits.locale_text: {n}他有点泄了气。{/n}“那就这样吧……看来今天不是我的幸运日。我到底什么时候才能走运呢？”

languages.text: {n}Su entusiasmo se apaga un poco.{/n} «Nada que hacer, entonces... Está claro que hoy no es mi día. Como siempre».
languages.original_text: {n}He slumps a little.{/n} "That's that, then... It's just not my day. When is it ever?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Su entusiasmo se apaga un poco.{/n} «Nada que hacer, entonces... Está claro que hoy no es mi día. Como siempre».

languages.text: {n}彼は少し落胆した。{/n}「そっか、しゃあねえな…俺って本当についてないな。死ぬまでこうなのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}He slumps a little.{/n} "That's that, then... It's just not my day. When is it ever?"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は少し落胆した。{/n}「そっか、しゃあねえな…俺って本当についてないな。死ぬまでこうなのか？」

languages.text: {n}Er sackt ein wenig in sich zusammen..{/n} "Das war's dann wohl ... Nicht mein Tag heute. Aber wann ist er das schon?"
languages.original_text: {n}He slumps a little.{/n} "That's that, then... It's just not my day. When is it ever?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er sackt ein wenig in sich zusammen..{/n} "Das war's dann wohl ... Nicht mein Tag heute. Aber wann ist er das schon?"

languages.text: {n}Il s'affaisse légèrement.{/n} « Bon, tant pis... Ce n'est pas mon jour, pour changer. »
languages.original_text: {n}He slumps a little.{/n} "That's that, then... It's just not my day. When is it ever?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il s'affaisse légèrement.{/n} « Bon, tant pis... Ce n'est pas mon jour, pour changer. »

languages.text: {n}Adam biraz çöküyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ o vakit... Yine yüzümüz gülmedi. Ne zaman güldü ki zaten?"
languages.original_text: {n}He slumps a little.{/n} "That's that, then... It's just not my day. When is it ever?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Birdenbire durgunlaşıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ o vakit... Bugün benim günüm değil. Ne zaman benim günüm oldu ki zaten?"
